doc:
Marion Burns https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marion_Burns 0 Marion Burns (August 9, 1907 – December 22, 1993) was an American film actress of the 1930s. She is best known for having starred opposite John Wayne in the 1935 film The Dawn Rider and opposite him again that same year in Paradise Canyon. Marion_Burns ( August_9_,_1907 – December_22_,_1993 ) was an_American_film_actress of the_1930s . She is_best_known for having_starred opposite_John_Wayne in the_1935_film The_Dawn_Rider_and_opposite him again_that_same_year in Paradise_Canyon .
